page.title: 06SNEATING HALL (1)
page.content: Sneating Hall is a home for the mentally and physically handicapped. Sneating Hall was mentioned in the first Domesday book written in 1095 by William the Conqueror. Sneating Hall then called Sneddon Hall was one of the four manors of Kirby_Le Soken. The grounds around Sneating Hall measures 8 acres, the ground is divided into 3 parts. There are four residents there at the moment but there will soon be 10. All the residents are adults. They are all like a big family. Mr. and Mrs Edwards are the current owners of Sneating Hall and they hope to live there for the rest of their lives.
